ErrorMessage.UnknownError: An unknown error occured. Please contact the support for more information.
ErrorMessage.ServerUnavailable: Unfortunately, the server is currently not available. Please try again later or contact the support.
ErrorMessage.UnauthorizedOperation: You are not allowed to perform this action. If you would like to perform this action anyways, please contact the administrator in order to ask for the permission.
ErrorMessage.NotFound: The requested resource is not available.
